response.overview: Ore Vaanam Ore Bhoomi (/oʊreɪ/ transl. One sky, one Earth)[1] is a 1979 Indian Tamil-language film directed by I. V. Sasi, starring Jaishankar, K. R. Vijaya and Seema. It was released on 22 June 1979.[2] The film was remade in Malayalam as Ezhamkadalinakkare the same year by the same director.
response.title: Ore Vaanam Ore Bhoomi
